newsitem.title: USA: American Radio to buy Ohio radio station.
newsitem.headline: American Radio to buy Ohio radio station.

text.p: American Radio Systems Corp said on Friday it reached an agreement to acquire radio station WGRR-FM in Cincinnati from The Dalton Group for about $30 million.
Completion of the deal was subject to U.S. Federal Communications Commission approval, it said. American Radio said it also had an agreement to own WKRQ-FM in Cincinnati.

Jacor Communications Inc said on December 27 it entered into an agreement to exchange the assets of its WKRQ-FM station for three of American Radio's stations in Rochester, N.Y. Terms were not disclosed. American also assigned Jacor an option to purchase WNVE-FM, another radio station in Rochester, it said.
